recipes.name: Discreet Spellthread
recipes.description: Permanently embroiders your cloak with discreet spellthread, reducing the amount of threat you generate with attacks and spells.  Only the tailor's cloak can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Feathery Spellthread
recipes.description: Permanently embroiders your cloak with feathery spellthread, allowing you to fall farther before taking damage.  Only the tailor's cloak can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Resilient Spellthread
recipes.description: Permanently embroiders your cloak with resilient spellthread, preventing you from being dazed while running or walking in Kul Tiras or Zandalar.  Only the tailor's cloak can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

recipes.name: Hexweave Cloth
recipes.description:
Produces 8, plus additional based on Tailoring skill. 

May also yield Sorcerous Water and/or Sorcerous Air.

Cooldown resets daily.

recipes.name: Hexweave Cloth
recipes.description:
Produces 10. May also yield Sorcerous Water and/or Sorcerous Air.

Can be performed up to three times in a row, but it takes 24 hours to recover 1 use.

recipes.name: Secrets of Draenor Tailoring
recipes.description: Cooldown resets daily.

recipes.name: Antiseptic Bandage
recipes.description: Recipe for 4. Actual yield will vary based on first aid skill.

recipes.name: Release Fire Spirit
recipes.description: Release the Fire Spirit.  The spirit will reward you with wisdom, permanently increasing your Tailoring skill by 1.

recipes.name: Master's Spellthread
recipes.description:
Permanently embroiders your pants with master's spellthread, increasing Intellect by 2 and critical strike by 1.

Only the tailor's pants can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound

recipes.name: Sanctified Spellthread
recipes.description:
Permanently embroiders your pants with sanctified spellthread, increasing Intellect by 2 and Spirit by 1.

Only the tailor's pants can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound

recipes.name: Imperial Silk
recipes.description: This delicate cloth can only be created once a day. In the process, you may discover a recipe you have yet to learn.

recipes.name: Song of Harmony
recipes.description: This special method of creating imperial silk can be performed as often as the tailor likes, as long as they can supply the necessary materials.

recipes.name: Celestial Cloth
recipes.description: Weave Celestial Cloth from Bolts of Windwool Cloth once a day.  In the process, you may discover a recipe you have yet to learn.

recipes.name: Deathsilk Robe
recipes.description: Rewards 3 skill points.

recipes.name: Dream of Skywall
recipes.description: Combines cloth and the elements of air to weave a piece of Dreamcloth.  This Dreamcloth recipe can only be created once a week.

recipes.name: Dream of Deepholm
recipes.description: Combines cloth and the elements of earth to weave a piece of Dreamcloth.  This Dreamcloth recipe can only be created once a week.

recipes.name: Dream of Ragnaros
recipes.description: Combines cloth and the elements of fire to weave a piece of Dreamcloth.  This Dreamcloth recipe can only be created once a week.

recipes.name: Dream of Hyjal
recipes.description: Combines cloth and the elements of life to weave a piece of Dreamcloth.  This Dreamcloth recipe can only be created once a week.

recipes.name: Dream of Azshara
recipes.description: Combines cloth and the elements of water to weave a piece of Dreamcloth.  This Dreamcloth recipe can only be created once a week.

recipes.name: Field Bandage: Dense Embersilk
recipes.description: While not as efficient as using raw cloth, you can make a stronger bandage in a pinch by weaving heavy bandages together.

recipes.name: Primal Mooncloth
recipes.description: Conversion of these items into Primal Mooncloth can only be done at a moonwell.

recipes.name: Spellcloth
recipes.description: Conversion of these items into spellcloth can only be done inside of Netherstorm and only once in a while can the energies of netherstorm be used in this way.   Draining power to create the spellcloth will bring the wrath of netherstorm on you.

recipes.name: Shadowcloth
recipes.description: Conversion of these items into Shadowcloth can only be done at the Altar of Shadows in Shadowmoon, and only occasionally can its power be used in such a way.
